Name: CrazyDriving
About the game: Crazy Driving is a time attack racing game . You try to set new time records and next time you play try to be faster then the last one. you can always return to default times if you want. You are racing against other normal cars (not racing cars). Getting the first place is optional though sometimes can be challenging (especially in open tracks). Select through 6 different cars and race in 8 different tracks. There are no racing tracks in this game , there is only small roads and big mountains. notice : If you want to use your gamepad you should connect it after running the game , if you connect it before running the game it will not work and the game will fail (a 'bug' i could not fix).
